contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox road |province=QC |type=QC |route=147 |maint=[[Transports Québec]] |map=Route 147-QC.png |established= |decommissioned= | length_km = 41.5 |length_round = 1 |length_ref=<ref>Ministère des transports, "Distances routières", page 70, Les Publications du Québec, 2005</ref> |direction_a=South |direction_b=North |terminus_a= {{jct|state=VT|VT|147}} at [[Norton, Vermont]] |terminus_b= {{jct|state=QC|QC|108|QC|143}} in [[Waterville, Quebec|Waterville]] |previous_type=QC |previous_route=143 |next_type=QC |next_route=148 |counties=[[Coaticook Regional County Municipality, Quebec|Coaticook]] |junction= {{jct|state=QC|QC|141|QC|206}} in Coaticook <br> {{jct|state=QC|QC|208}} in Compton }} '''Route 147''' is a two-lane north/south highway on the south shore of the [[Saint Lawrence River]] in Quebec, Canada. Its northern terminus is in Waterville at the junction of [[Quebec Route 143|Route 143]], and the southern terminus is at the border with Norton, Vermont, where the road continues past the [[Norton-Stanhope Border Crossing]] as [[Vermont Route 147]]. ==Municipalities along Route 147== * ''[[Stanhope, Quebec|Stanhope]]'' ([[Coaticook, Quebec|Coaticook]]) * [[Dixville, Quebec|Dixville]] * [[Coaticook, Quebec|Coaticook]] * [[Compton, Quebec|Compton]] * [[Waterville, Quebec|Waterville]] ==Major intersections== {| class=wikitable ![[List of regional county municipalities and equivalent territories in Quebec|RCM]] or [[List of regional county municipalities and equivalent territories in Quebec|ET]] !Municipality !Km !Road !Notes |- |colspan="5"|{{center|'''Southern terminus of Route 147'''}} |- |rowspan="7"|[[Coaticook Regional County Municipality, Quebec|Coaticook]] |''Stanhope'' |0.0 |{{jct|state=VT|VT|147}} |<small>'''147 SOUTH:'''</small> to [[Norton, Vermont]] |- |rowspan="3"|Coaticook |{{Jctint/type|concur}}|12.7 |{{Jctint/type|concur}}|{{jct|state=QC|QC|141}} <small>'''(Overlap 2.4 km)'''</small> |{{Jctint/type|concur}}|<small>'''141 SOUTH:'''</small> to |{{Jctint/type|concur}}|15.1 |{{Jctint/type|concur}}|{{jct|state=QC|QC|141}} <small>'''(Overlap 2.4 km)'''</small> |{{Jctint/type|concur}}|<small>'''141 NORTH:'''</small> to [[Barnston-Ouest, Quebec|Barnston-Ouest]] |- |Compton |{{Jctint/type|concur}}|27.9 <br> 28.2 |{{Jctint/type|concur}}|{{jct|state=QC|QC|208}} <small>'''(Overlap 0.3 km)'''</small> |{{Jctint/type|concur}}|<small>'''208 EAST:'''</small> to [[Martinville, Quebec|Martinville]] <br> <small>'''208 WEST:'''</small> to [[Hatley, Quebec|Hatley]] |- |rowspan="2"|Waterville |rowspan="2"|41.5 |{{jct|state=QC|QC|108}} |<small>'''108 WEST:'''</small> to [[North Hatley, Quebec|North Hatley]] <br> <small>'''108 EAST:'''</small> to ''[[Lennoxville, Quebec|Lennoxville]]'' ([[Sherbrooke]]) |- |{{jct|state=QC|QC|143}} |
